description: Schema for storing historical snapshots of resource items (e.g. classification, interpretation)
title: Resource history

___resourceParent.description: Snapshot of the entire parent object of the resource item
___resourceParent.title: The parent snapshot object of the resource item

___gdm.description: Snapshot of the entire GDM parent object of the resource item
___gdm.title: GDM snapshot

___interpretation.description: Snapshot of the entire Interpretation parent object of the resource item
___interpretation.title: Interpretation snapshot

___associatedSnapshot.description: Another snapshot that is paired with this one (e.g. approval with its targeted provisional)
___associatedSnapshot.title: Associated snapshot object UUID

___resourceType.description: The type of the resource item
___resourceType.title: Resource item type

___approvalStatus.description: The status of the approval process
___approvalStatus.title: Approval Status

___resourceId.description: The UUID of the resource item
___resourceId.title: Resource ID

___resource.description: Snapshot of the entire resource item object
___resource.title: Resource item object
